title: Worlds 2016 On-Air Team
body:
Play-by-play Commentators

    Daniel “Tsepha” Drakos
    David “Phreak” Turley
    Devin “PiraTechnics” Younge - nah, flag that
    Julian “Pastrytime” Carr
    Max “Atlus” Anderson
    Trevor “Quickshot” Henry
    Rivington Bisland III
    Richard “Pulse” Kam - nah, flag that

Color Commentators and Analysts

    Aidan “Zirene” Moon
    **Chris “PapaSmithy” Smith** YEWWWWWW
    Clement Chu
    Indiana “Froskurinn” Black
    Isaac “Azael” Cummings-Bentley - nah, flag that
    Jake “Spawn” Tiberi
    James “Stress” O’Leary - nah, flag that
    Joshua “Jatt” Leesman
    Martin “Deficio” Lynge
    Mitch “Krepo” Voorspoels
    **Nick “LastShadow” de Cesare** YEWWWWWW
    Sam “Kobe” Hartman-Kenzler
    Zack “Rusty” Pye

Interviews and Hosts 

    Eefje “Sjokz” Depoortere
    James “Dash” Patterson

We’ll have guest spots for pro players, coaches, and former pros to join us at the analyst desk throughout Worlds 2016.

replies.body: No Monte or Doa at worlds is a huge loss for spectators.

> [{quoted}](name=Eimer Troll,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=92pMa14g,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-18T02:07:33.314+0000)
>
> No Monte or Doa at worlds is a huge loss for spectators.

For sure. They are lucky to have PapaSmithy though, he can fill in the gaps from the LCK.
